mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.hits, A.rdt , B.nm AS writernm FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.hits, A.rdt , B.nm AS writernm FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
